Introduction

Kohyeon is a South Korean singer under HOWLING Entertainment. He was part of the duo LuhaxHyeon and is also the leader of the boy group WAKER.

Prior to these, he was part of the pre-debut lineup of Ten-X and the boy group 14U.

Kohyeon embarked on his solo career with the release of the digital single “Don’t Laugh” on August 23, 2021.

He and Luha formed a duo on January 13, 2022 with the debut digital single "You, me = Us".

On November 13, 2023, it was revealed that is a member of the upcoming boy group WAKER; they made their debut on January 8, 2024 with the mini album "Mission of School"
